Urls¶

Project’s Urls¶

  1. Imports for project’s urls

1from django.conf import settings
2from django.conf.urls.static import static
3from django.contrib import admin
4from django.urls import path, include

  1. Urlpatterns of Project’s Urls

1urlpatterns = [
2path('admin/', admin.site.urls),
3path('', include('Tech.urls')),
4]

  1. Serve media files during development

1if settings.DEBUG:
2   urlpatterns += static(settings.MEDIA_URL, document_root=settings.MEDIA_ROOT)

Tech apps Urls¶

Imports¶

1from django.urls import path
2from . import views
3from .views import CustomPasswordChangeView, CustomPasswordResetView

Main pages Urls¶

  • /: Home page.

  • /about/: About page.

  • /contact/: Contact page.

  • /faqs/: Frequently Asked Questions page.

  • /privacy_policy/: Privacy Policy page.

1path('', views.HomeView.as_view(), name='home'),
2path('about/', views.AboutView.as_view(), name='about'),
3path('contact/', views.ContactView.as_view(), name='contact'),
4path('faqs/', views.FaqsView.as_view(), name='faqs'),
5path('privacy_policy/', views.PrivacyPolicyView.as_view(), name='privacy_policy'),

User-Related URLs¶

  • /signup/: User registration.

  • /login/: User login.

  • /logout/: User logout.

  • /user/profile/: User profile.

1path('signup/', views.SignupView.as_view(), name='signup'),
2path('login/', views.CustomLoginView.as_view(), name='login'),
3path('logout/', views.CustomLogoutView.as_view(), name='logout'),
4path('user/profile/', views.UserProfileView.as_view(), name='user_profile'),

User Blog Post URLs¶

  • /dashboard/: User’s blog post dashboard.

  • /create/: Create a new blog post.

  • /blog/<int:blog_post_id>/edit/: Edit a specific blog post.

  • /blog/<int:blog_post_id>/delete/: Delete a specific blog post.

1path('dashboard/', views.DashboardView.as_view(), name='dashboard'),
2path('create/', views.CreateBlogPostView.as_view(), name='create_blog_post'),
3path('blog/<int:blog_post_id>/edit', views.EditBlogPostView.as_view(), name='edit_blog_post'),
4path('blog/<int:blog_post_id>/delete', views.DeleteBlogPostView.as_view(), name='delete_blog_post'),

Blog Post URLs¶

  • /blog/: List of all blog posts.

  • /blog/<slug:post_slug>/: Detailed view of a specific blog post.

  • /author-posts/<str:author_name>/: Blog posts by a specific author.

1path('blog/', views.BlogPostsView.as_view(), name='blog_post_lists'),
2path('blog/<slug:post_slug>/', views.BlogPostDetailView.as_view(), name='blog_post_detail'),
3path('author-posts/<str:author_name>/', views.AuthorPostView.as_view(), name='author_posts'),

Category URLs¶

  • /category/: List of all categories.

  • /category/<str:category>/: Blog posts in a specific category.

1path('category/', views.CategoryView.as_view(), name='all_categories'),
2path('category/<str:category>/', views.CategoryView.as_view(), name='category_posts'),

Password-Related URLs¶

  • /password_change/: Change password.

  • /password_reset/: Reset password.

1path('password_change/', CustomPasswordChangeView.as_view(), name='password_change'),
2path('password_reset/', CustomPasswordResetView.as_view(), name='password_reset')
